briefdescription.para: Opaque type for the XSArray objects.
Appends a value at the end of the array.

detaileddescription.para:
The appended value will be automatically retained.
xsThis
The array object
value
The value to append
void

briefdescription.para: Checks if the array contains a specific value.

simplesect.para: YES if the array contains the value, otherwise NO

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of values in the array.

simplesect.para: The number of values in the array

briefdescription.para: Initializes an empty array with an initial capacity.

parameterdescription.para: Other values, terminated by a NULL fence.

briefdescription.para: Insert a value at a specific index.

detaileddescription.para:
The inserted value will be automatically retained.
xsThis
The array object
value
The value to insert
i
The index in the array
void

briefdescription.para: Increases the internal value pointer and returns the value.
Decrease the internal value pointer and returns the value.
Removes a value at a specific index.

detaileddescription.para:
The removed value will be released, so it may be NULL
xsThis
The array object
i
The index in the array
The removed value

briefdescription.para: Replace the value at a specific index with a new value.

detaileddescription.para:
The new value will be automatically retained, and the old value will be released.
xsThis
The array object
value
The value to insert
i
The index in the array
The old value

briefdescription.para: Sets the internal value pointer to the first value in the array.
Gets the value at a specific index.
